title: Year-End Mailbag! The Top 10 Performances, Trailers, and Needle Drops of 2021
description:
It’s our last episode of the year and Sean and Amanda are celebrating 2021 by naming their 10 favorite performances on the big screen (1:00) before opening up the mailbag to answer your questions ahead of the new year (38:00).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: The Ringer
